```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> x = np.array([[11.2, -3.973, 18], [0.801, -1.41, 12], [7, 33, -12]])
>>> masked_x = np.ma.masked_array(x, mask=x < 0)
>>> masked_x
masked_array(
 data=[[11.2, --, 18.0],
 [0.801, --, 12.0],
 [7.0, 33.0, --]],
 mask=[[False,  True, False],
 [False,  True, False],
 [False, False,  True]],
 fill_value=1e+20) 
```

```py
>>> np.ma.diag(masked_x)
masked_array(data=[11.2, --, --],
 mask=[False,  True,  True],
 fill_value=1e+20) 
```
